intro.description: The following steps show how to plot a process variable.

item.title: Open the dedicated perspective
item.description: Menu Window -> Open Perspective -> Other… and select Data Browser.

item.title: Open a new plot
item.description: From the Tool bar, click on icon "new Data Browser plot" in CSS toolbar or use the menu CSS -> Trends -> Data Browser.

item.title: Add a PV
item.description: Right-click on the plot contextual menu, select the option "Add PV". Enter Name “sim://sine”

item.title: Adjust the plot
item.description: Wait a little, use the Horizontal Zoom button.

item.title: For more information
item.description: Click on the Question Mark on the right to open related help.
